name: Fatal Yandere Love Triangle
summary: You're living an ordinary high school life, and one day, you're confessed to by three girls around the same time. As it turns out, all three of them, who seemed normal at first glance, all hold feelings for you that go beyond simple fondness. From blackmail to signing a contract, you're pressured into dating each one, and are now trying to make sure none of these girls find out about the others. You can't do this for forever, though—you're going to have to choose someone sooner or later. And what will become of the girls who aren't chosen? Well, you'll soon find out...
